purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of assemblies of parts, of their properties, of their shape and of their associated documentation.

This application module provides a product structure functionality that is intended to meet the most common requirements in industrial practice. It collects together the following application modules:
Additionally it adds the following capabilities:

ul.li: the capability to identify products that are interchangeable, that is, they may replace another product in any usage;
the capability to assign properties to relationships between view definitions.

inscope.li: specification of the use of a product version as a component of an assembly;
identification of a component of an assembly with respect to an upper level in the assembly structure;
replication of a geometric model through the application of a geometric transformation;
representation of the fact that a part version results from the transformation of another;
identification of a part and of its versions;
representation of the shape of the part with an external file;
representation of the properties of a part version;
identification of the documents that provide information about the part or its versions;
identification of the substitution of a component by another in an assembly;
identification of a relationship between two versions of product;
identification of an identity relationship between two versions of product made by two organizations;
identification of a product as a potential replacing product for another product in any usage;
representation of the properties of a part relationship version.

outscope.li: management data other than information identifying the owner of a part id;
representation of shape with geometric models not described in external files.

uof.description: The Product structure UOF provides the data structure for the representation of assemblies of parts.
